text: Budget fixed price no frills all you can eat buffet. good value and friendly staff.

Quick staff, food is what you pay for! Some dishes are very nice, others feel like they have been around for some time. However it's a buffet, that's what you get sometime. The Chinese tea was nice, we had good portions of food for the money. Seating was quite cramped directly next to the buffet, which was a bit uncomfortable.
